menu:
Welcome to the midwife tool!!!
        You will be asked some questions in order to automaticly generate your project.
        So let's get started ...

fields.label: in which path would you like to generate the project

fields.note: considering that the author #1 of this project is you ...

fields.label: what is the name of the author #{}
what is the e-mail of the author #{}
what is the username of the author #{}
in few words, how would you describe this project
does the source code of this project have any license

fields.note: according to the requirements file format (https://pip.readthedocs.io/en/1.1/requirements.html) ...
fields.label: what are the requirements of this project

escape.message: double press the enter key for skipping this question

confirmation.message: would you like to generate a data science project according to the given information
